articles.title: USWNT pledges to 'come together' after nearby fatal shooting in Auckland - FOX Sports
articles.description: The USWNT spent part of its morning under lockdown after a shooting in downtown Auckland. A gunman killed two people and injured five others, mere hours before the FIFA Women's World Cup was set to kick off.
